word_mean: 外周部，周围部：向外的部分、面或结构，位于系统中心区以外的部分

sentence.Network_en: industrial development on the periphery of the town
sentence.Network_cn: 城镇周边地区工业的发展

sentence.Network_en: Other animals were depicted on the periphery of the group.
sentence.Network_cn: 其他动物在群像的外围加以修饰.

sentence.Network_en: Taste buds are concentrated at the tip and rear of the tongue and around its periphery.
sentence.Network_cn: 味蕾集中于舌尖、舌根和舌头两侧。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... perimeter 周边 periphery 外围，不重要部分 poly- 表示“多”.
字典中周字的解释 ... (14) 诚,忠信[ honest] (1) 周围[ circumference;circle;ring;periphery] (3) 拐角儿[ corner].
周字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 周北门〖 thenorth-gateofLuoyi,thecapitalinZhouDynasty〗 周边〖 periphery〗 周遍〖 general〗.
托福听力词汇——生物类 - 豆丁网 ... hyena 【动物】鬣狗 6. periphery 边缘 7. commonsense 常识 8.

list.abs: periphery 周围periphery hole 周边炮眼permafrost table 永冻面
peripherals 外围设备periphery fault 周缘断层periphery 周线
flange nut 圆缘螺母flange periphery 法兰边缘flange ring 法兰环
The design of the periphery circuit is a crucial problems of CCD application ., 外围电路的设计是 CCD 应用的关键问题.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent. (denoting a line that forms the boundary of something): via late Latin from Greek periphereia 'circumference', from peripherēs 'revolving around', from peri- 'around' + pherein 'to bear'

entry.def: If something is on the periphery of an area, place, or thing, it is on the edge of it.

example.ex: Geographically, the UK is on the periphery of Europe, while Paris is at the heart of the continent...
example.tran: 从地理位置上讲，英国处于欧洲边缘，而巴黎却位于欧洲大陆的中心位置。

example.ex: Taste buds are concentrated at the tip and rear of the tongue and around its periphery.
example.tran: 味蕾集中于舌尖、舌根和舌头两侧。

entry.def: The periphery of a subject or area of interest is the part of it that is not considered to be as important or basic as the main part.

example.ex: The sociological study of religion moved from the centre to the periphery of sociology.
example.tran: 宗教的社会学研究从社会学的中心学科变成了边缘学科。

means.word_mean: 1. the outside boundary or surface of something

stems_affixes.word_buile: peri周围,靠近+patet踏,走+ic→走遍→巡游
peri周围,靠近+phras=phrase词语+tic……的→词语绕圈→冗赘的
peri周围,靠近+gee走→走到周围→近地点
peri周围,靠近+meter测量→测量一圈→周边
peri周围,靠近+pher带有+y→带到周围→外围
peri周围,靠近+scope周围→[潜望镜伸出水面]看周围情况→潜望镜
